hint.en: This setting will effect the language used in the official Bluelink/Uvo app. Seems to works for EU region only at the moment.
hint.sv: Den h칛r inst칛llningen p친verkar spr친ket som anv칛nds i den officiella Bluelink/Uvo-appen. Verkar bara fungera f칬r EU-regionen f칬r n칛rvarande.

hint.en:
Interval for checking the server for a status change.
Attention: Homey will only receive status updates from the car when you park the car, or by doing a manual refresh!
WARNING: A low poll interval can get you locked out of the server!
hint.sv:
Intervall f칬r att kontrollera servern f칬r en status칛ndring.
Obs: Homey kommer bara att f친 statusuppdateringar fr친n bilen n칛r du parkerar bilen, eller genom att g칬ra en manuell uppdatering!
VARNING: En l친g intervall kan g칬ra att du blir utel친st fr친n servern!

hint.en:
Interval for checking the car status while the engine is on.
Attention: for Homey to know that the engine is on, a manual refresh or cloud refresh must be performed!
WARNING: A low poll interval can get you locked out of the server!
Disable this function by setting the time to 0.
hint.sv:
Intervall f칬r att kontrollera bilens status medan motorn 칛r p친.
Obs: f칬r att Homey ska veta att motorn 칛r p친 m친ste en manuell uppdatering eller molnuppdatering utf칬ras!
VARNING: En l친g intervall kan g칬ra att du blir utel친st fr친n servern !
Inaktivera den h칛r funktionen genom att st칛lla in tiden till 0.

hint.en:
Interval for checking the car status also when the engine is off.
WARNING: This will drain your 12V battery fast!
A low poll interval can get you locked out of the server
Disable this function by setting the time to 0.
hint.sv:
Intervall f칬r att kontrollera bilens status 칛ven n칛r motorn 칛r avst칛ngd.
VARNING: Detta kommer att t칬mma ditt 12V-batteri snabbt!
En l친g pollningsintervall kan g칬ra att du l친ses ute fr친n servern
Inaktivera den h칛r funktionen genom att st칛lla in tiden till 0.

hint.en: When giving a refresh command the car starts charging even when the charging was off. Enabling the fix option will disable charging after a refresh.
hint.sv: N칛r du ger ett uppdateringskommando b칬rjar bilen ladda 칛ven n칛r laddningen var avst칛ngd. Om du aktiverar fixalternativet inaktiveras laddningen efter en uppdatering.

label.en: Start status refresh via cloud (HTTP GET)

hint.en: Enter any unique secret (numbers and normal characters only). Leave empty to disable cloud refresh.
hint.sv: Ange en unik hemlighet (endast siffror och normala tecken). L칛mna tomt f칬r att inaktivera molnuppdatering.

hint.en: The cloud refresh URL is very long and difficult to type into your phone automation app. A short URL can be created for you using Bitly. Attention: Bitly gathers statistics when this link is used.
hint.sv: Webbadressen f칬r molnuppdatering 칛r mycket l친ng och sv친r att skriva in i din telefonautomatiseringsapp. En kort URL kan skapas 친t dig med Bitly. Observera: Bitly samlar in statistik n칛r denna l칛nk anv칛nds.

hint.en: After entering a secret, you can force a car refresh by calling this website (HTTP GET). This can be usefull when you want to automatically start updates when your phone connects to the car's bluetooth.
hint.sv: Efter att ha angett en hemlighet kan du tvinga fram en biluppdatering genom att ange denna webbplats (HTTP GET). Detta kan vara anv칛ndbart n칛r du automatiskt vill starta uppdateringar n칛r din telefon ansluter till bilens bluetooth.

label.sv: Inst칛llningar f칬r A Better Route Planner

hint.en: ABRP interface only works for EV/PHEV vehicles. Get a token from the ABRP app. Settings > Detailed > Car model > Car settings > Link Homey > copy the token.
hint.sv: ABRP-gr칛nssnittet fungerar endast f칬r EV/PHEV-fordon. F친 en token fr친n ABRP-appen. Inst칛llningar > Detaljerad > Bilmodell > Bilinst칛llningar > Link Homey > kopiera token.

hint.en:
Using Google Directions will improve Estimated Time To Home (ETTH) calculations, including real-time traffic.
Get a key at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/directions/get-api-key.
Leave empty to disable Google Directions.
hint.sv:
Att anv칛nda Google Directions kommer att f칬rb칛ttra ber칛kningarna av ber칛knad tid till hemmet (ETTH), inklusive realtidstrafik.
F친 en nyckel p친 https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/directions/get-api-key.
L칛mna tom f칬r att inaktivera Google v칛gbeskrivningar.
